content: If a high hill stood between A and B, it was important to decide whether the line should climb over it, pierce it with a tunnel, or make a detour to avoid it.
translations: ita:Se tra A e B c'era una collina alta, era importante decidere se la linea dovesse scavalcarla, attraversarla con un tunne
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by AlanF_US (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
